alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascade Foothills; South Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 4:02AM PST until December 30 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches for the Cascades and 3 to 5 inches for the Cascade foothills. * WHERE...South Washington Cascades and South Washington Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 7 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels rise to about 1000 feet Thursday afternoon, then gradually lower Thursday night.
info.instruction: Prepare for winter driving conditions. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: South Washington Cascade Foothills; South Washington Cascades
